Title: 25 Degrees in Winter
Writer: Stéphane Malandrin, Pedro Romero, Stéphane Vuillet
Actors: Carmen Maura, Jacques Gamblin, Ingeborga Dapkunaite, Raphaëlle Molinier
Plot: An Ukranian woman enters Belgium illegally and hides in the van of a driver abandoned by his wife. He ends up helping her to find her husband who had emigrated long before. They are joined ...
